info.title: AIA Calculator API
info.description: Emissions Calculators for various farming activities

schema.description: Input data required for the Aquaculture calculator

items.description: Input data required for a single Aquaculture enterprise

id.description: Unique identifier for this Aquaculture activity

state.description: What state the location is in. Note: Western Australia is split up into two regions, `wa_nw` is North-West Western Australia, `wa_sw` is South-West Western Australia

productionSystem.description: Production system of the aquaculture enterprise

chargeSize.description: Amount of refrigerant contained in the appliance, in kg

emissionsIntensity.description: Emissions intensity of additional ingredients, in kg CO2e/kg bait (default 0)
Emissions intensity of product, in kg CO2e/kg bait

inboundFreight.description: Services used to transport goods to the enterprise

totalKmTonnes.description: Total distance of freight, in kilometre tonnes

outboundFreight.description: Services used to transport goods from the enterprise

totalKmTonnes.description: Total distance of freight, in kilometre tonnes

totalCommercialFlightsKm.description: Total distance of commercial flights, in km (kilometers)

electricityRenewable.description: Percent of total electricity usage that is drawn from renewable sources, between 0 and 1. Unused if `electricitySource` is `Renewable`

transportFuel.description: A list of fuels used in transportation and vehicles

stationaryFuel.description: A list of fuels used in stationary applications

naturalGas.description: Amount of natural gas consumed in Mj (megajoules)

fluidWaste.description: Amount of fluid waste, in kL (kilolitres)

fluidWasteKl.description: Amount of fluid waste, in kL (kilolitres)

flaredCombustedFraction.description: Fraction of waste flared or combusted, between 0 and 1

sentOffsiteTonnes.description: Amount of solid waste sent offsite to landfill, in tonnes

onsiteCompostingTonnes.description: Amount of solid waste composted on site, in tonnes

carbonOffsets.description: Carbon offsets purchased, in t CO2. Offsetting 2 t CO2 would be 2.0 (not -2.0)

schema.description: Emissions calculation output for the Aquaculture calculator

scope1.description: Scope 1 greenhouse gas emissions are the emissions released to the atmosphere as a direct result of an activity, in tonnes-CO2e (tonnes of carbon dioxide equivalent)

fuelCO2.description: CO2 emissions from fuel use, in tonnes-CO2e

fuelCH4.description: CH4 emissions from fuel use, in tonnes-CO2e

fuelN2O.description: N2O emissions from fuel use, in tonnes-CO2e

hfcsRefrigerantLeakage.description: Emissions from refrigerant leakage, in tonnes-HFCs

compostedSolidWasteCO2.description: Emissions from composted solid waste, in tonnes-CO2e

totalCO2.description: Total CO2 scope 1 emissions, in tonnes-CO2e

totalCH4.description: Total CH4 scope 1 emissions, in tonnes-CO2e

totalN2O.description: Total N2O scope 1 emissions, in tonnes-CO2e

totalHFCs.description: Total HFCs scope 1 emissions, in tonnes-CO2e

scope2.description: Scope 2 greenhouse gas emissions are the emissions released to the atmosphere from the indirect consumption of an energy commodity, in tonnes-CO2e (tonnes of carbon dioxide equivalent)

scope3.description: Scope 3 emissions are indirect greenhouse gas emissions other than scope 2 emissions that are generated in the wider economy, in tonnes-CO2e (tonnes of carbon dioxide equivalent)

purchasedBait.description: Emissions from purchased bait, in tonnes-CO2e

commercialFlights.description: Emissions from commercial flights, in tonnes-CO2e

inboundFreight.description: Emissions from inbound freight, in tonnes-CO2e

outboundFreight.description: Emissions from outbound freight, in tonnes-CO2e

solidWasteSentOffsite.description: Emissions from solid waste sent offsite, in tonnes-CO2e

total.description: Annual amount of carbon sequestered, in tonnes-CO2e

aquacultureExcludingCarbonOffsets.description: Aquaculture emissions intensity excluding sequestration, in kg-CO2e/kg

aquacultureIncludingCarbonOffsets.description: Aquaculture emissions intensity including sequestration, in kg-CO2e/kg

total.description: Annual amount of carbon sequestered, in tonnes-CO2e

limestoneFraction.description: Fraction of lime as limestone vs dolomite, between 0 and 1

fertiliser.description: Fertiliser used for different applications (such as dryland pasture)

pastureDryland.description: Urea fertiliser used for dryland pasture, in tonnes Urea

pastureIrrigated.description: Urea fertiliser used for irrigated pasture, in tonnes Urea

cropsDryland.description: Urea fertiliser used for dryland crops, in tonnes Urea

cropsIrrigated.description: Urea fertiliser used for irrigated crops, in tonnes Urea

otherFertilisers.description: Array of Other N fertiliser. Version note: If this field is set and has a length > 0, the `other` fields within this object are ignored, and this array is used instead

items.description: Other fertiliser, of a specific type, used for different applications (such as dryland pasture)

otherDryland.description: Other N fertiliser used for dryland. From v1.1.0, supply tonnes of product. For earlier versions, supply tonnes of N

otherIrrigated.description: Other N fertiliser used for irrigated. From v1.1.0, supply tonnes of product. For earlier versions, supply tonnes of N

mineralBlock.description: Mineral block product used, in tonnes

mineralBlockUrea.description: Fraction of urea content, between 0 and 1

weanerBlock.description: Weaner block product used, in tonnes

weanerBlockUrea.description: Fraction of urea content, between 0 and 1

drySeasonMix.description: Dry season mix product used, in tonnes

drySeasonMixUrea.description: Fraction of urea content, between 0 and 1

electricityRenewable.description: Percent of total electricity usage that is drawn from renewable sources, between 0 and 1. Unused if `electricitySource` is `Renewable`

grainFeed.description: Grain purchased for cattle feed in tonnes

hayFeed.description: Hay purchased for cattle feed in tonnes

cottonseedFeed.description: Cotton seed purchased for cattle feed in tonnes

herbicide.description: Total amount of active ingredients of from herbicide (Paraquat, Diquat, Glyphosate) in kg (kilograms)

herbicideOther.description: Total amount of active ingredients of from other herbicides in kg (kilograms)

cowsCalving.description: Fraction of cows calving in each season, between 0 and 1

items.description: Savannah burning along with allocations to beef

burning.description: Inputs required for any savannah burning activities that took place

fuel.description: The fuel class size that was burnt

season.description: The time relative to the fire season in which the burning took place

patchiness.description: The patchiness of the savannah/vegetation that was burnt

rainfallZone.description: The rainfall zone in which the burning took place

yearsSinceLastFire.description: Time since the last fire, in years

fireScarArea.description: The total area of the fire scar, in ha (hectares)

vegetation.description: The vegetation class that was burnt

allocationToBeef.description: The proportion of the burning that is allocated to each beef activity

items.description: Non-productive vegetation inputs along with allocations to each Beef activity

vegetation.description: Inputs required for non-productive vegetation in order to calculate carbon sequestration

region.description: The rainfall region that the vegetation is in

soil.description: The soil type the tree is in
